comment.body:
Unfortunately, the reported issue does not satisfy our [filters policy](https://kb.adguard.com/en/general/adguard-filter-policy).
The site has too little traffic.

Please add to your user rules:

```
milyin.com##div[style^="min-height: 65px;"]
milyin.com##.Earning
```
